tab1.text1:
This is a no Wipe Server; If server is to wipe due to unforeseen circumstances, server saves will be uploaded to public drop box


PvE Server rules:
-Cave building is allowed, but artifacts must be accessible in someway (walk through or powered public Mini-Teleporters).
-Spam to prevent other players expanding is considered grifing and will be delt with accordingly.
-Speedhacking and meshed bases will result in adminwipe and ban.

Generic Server Setting: (full rates listed in 'Server Settings' tab)
-Gernic rates 2.5x

-Tek Mini-Teleporters auto unlock at lv60 (this allows people to use community public teleporters)

-TekBinoculars auto unlock at lv60 (can be used but requires Replicator to craft)

-Stackable items upto 1000, expect:
   ARB default 100
   Shards default 1000
   Organic Poly 200 

-Nonstackables items upto 20, expect:
   Blueprints
   Fertilizer

tab2.text1:
-Max Wild Lv 150 (OverrideOfficialDifficulty=5.0)
-Global Xp Multiplier = 2.5
-Taming Multiplier = 2.5
Harvesting Multiplier = 2.5
Imprint Ammount Multiplier = 2.5
- Baby Cuddle Interval = 0.24 (4.166x)
Baby Growth Multiplier = 4
Mating Interval = 0.25 (4x)
